songs.title: Mo Bodies
songs.lyrics:
Https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A2BDolDb9Qk&list=PLplR2sVcoXWGyOo0ttne2bpJ7_x_m38I7&index=6I mean shit
I  mean basically thugging
This  is Compton man you feel me
This is one of the worst things to be in, in California
Hey dawg and I mean
This,  Watts Long Beach, LA, you feel me
These  are cities where it goes down at
You have to be, I mean this is what I’m saying

BG:  Real talk and it ain’t just movie shit
Real shit

For real

I done been through a lot
My  shread pop
I mean go to the top
I been holla go to the stove
Cooking crack in a phial
This old nigga tainted
Cook us something now

Yeah cause I walk in the club
Two of my friends they show me love
Rock so cool man I kick the bud
Once a load of gold
Make my pockets be tough
Niggas scared people can’t
Fuck with me
We’re the G’s or the OG’s
Man fuck with me
3.5 started with a ball
Fail my buddy about
Six feet tall

Tell my bud who laid the  call
Lame ass niggas think that I’m gonna call
Bust his face all day
Now I’m headed to Dre’s
I’m turnt up to the max
Yo and now I’m the Vega
It’s been six months thinking
I’m getting paid
Brother I wouldn’t lie
We used to pray for these days
RIP Machiavelli cause he showed me
The way and I ain’t got nothing like them
I got something to say
Hold up

Nobody
And I ain’t scared of nobody
Mo bodies
Niggas mad, fuck around gonna be
Mo bodies

Mo bodies
And I ain’t scared of nobody
Mo bodies
Niggas mad, we don’t like really nobody
Mo bodies
Fucking nobodies
And I ain’t scared of nobody
Mo bodies
Niggas mad, fuck around gonna be
Mo bodies

A lot of niggas say they ill
Nigga thinking they trill
Saying that they won’t snitch
But I’m thinking they will
Saying they ain’t no bitch
But I’m thinking they are
Speak above the proper tone
And I’m breaking your jaw

A lot of suckers in this game
Want to roll with a gang
I ain’t never did a thing
Just claiming the fame
If I catch you in my lane
Then I’m banging your brain

Screaming fuck sucks it sucks
While I’m claiming the fame
Got a weapon so big it’s like it came with a crane
And I back a baby statement
While I’m making a claim
I’m from the west side NB
Where the niggas ain’t friendly
Sag with a blue rag
Cause this ain’t  trendy
If you want to count the bodies
Nigga we got plenty
Plus  there’s many more to go
So our clips ain’t empty
And I’m up to saying fuck you
Like Joe Gotti
Since God is the spirit
II’m running from nobody

Nobody
Mo bodies
And I ain’t scared of noboby
Mo bodies
Niggas mad, fuck around gonna be
Mo bodies

Mo bodies
And I ain’t scared of nobody
Mo bodies
Niggas mad, we don’t like really nobody
Mo bodies
Fucking nobodies
And I ain’t scared of nobody
Mo bodies
Niggas mad, fuck around gonna be
Mo bodies

Yo word I”m gonna tell you
The hat you wear out here dawg it stands for a lot B
The hat you wear out here dawg
I mean watch what you wear, and what you don’t wear, dawg
They push more shit with hats man
The Mets hat, the New York hats
The Pirates hat, the Washington hat
All them hats out here , they mean something dawg, man
You feel me?
Cause it’s like
Watch what you wear
And what you don’t wear
Out here dawg
There’s New York gangstas
More people dawg, it’s like
Nine times out of 10 dawg
My man got popped
He was from New York
But check it
He had a hat on
And they said no
He was not in the right neighborhood

BG: Word

And they dropped him
You know what I’m saying?

BG: He didn’t make it. Bad
Sorry to hear that brother
